name: Dani
greetingText: I know you didn't want anything today but..
wishText: keep smiling, you shine like nobody else
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do. But then I thought, You gave me a bit of your art
text3: This is a bit of mine
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: This will be here forever to remind you that you are amazing (or at least until the internet dies)
